## Problem Statement
A clear description of the problem or limitation you're facing.
Ex: "I want to be able to..."

Describe the solution you'd like to see implemented.

Explain the use case for this feature. How would you use it?

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

```
# Example command or code
SET key value EX 60 NX
```

Add any other context, screenshots, or references about the feature request.
